title: Senior Research Associate / Medical Writer - Market Access and Outcomes Strategy
text:
This position requires technical experience in health economics and value communication and/or medical writing . 
The qualified individual will be responsible for the following: Planning, conducting and reporting literature searches (systematic and non-systematic), including protocol preparation, development of search strategies, screening of abstracts and articles, designing data extraction forms, completing data extraction and undertaking quality assessment. Conducting desktop research through the internet, to gather, analyse and summarise appropriate information for incorporation into various documents. Writing and reviewing project deliverables including reports, manuscripts, global value dossiers, health technology assessment dossiers and slide sets in the areas of health economics and market access. Contributing to discussions with clients and wider RT-HS team members. Supporting other project activities as needed including drafting sections of proposals, completing internal documentation and reviewing the work of others. 
The candidate should also have experience in developing proposals and working in project teams to support project work for European and US-based clients. 
Qualifications, skills and experience: BSc with at least 5 years of medical/clinical writing experience, preferably in a pharmaceutical/biotechnology/healthcare consultancy setting or equivalent. Alternatively, scientific writing experience in an academic, publication, or industrial setting may be acceptable. Experience writing global value dossiers, reimbursement dossiers, and literature reviews. Knowledge of the fundamentals of health economics, literature reviewing and health technology assessment. Experience of working in project teams to support work for European and US based pharmaceutical clients. 
Preferred: Masters or PhD with at least 2 years of medical/clinical writing experience. 
About RTI 
RTI-Health Solutions provides scientifically rigorous research and consulting services to pharmaceutical, biotech and medical device companies. Our research and consulting services focus on health economics and outcomes research. Our various practice areas include: Health Economics, Patient Reported Outcomes, Pharmacoepidemiology, Drug Safety and Pharmacovigilance, Market Access and Outcomes Strategy, Biostatistics, Clinical Services and Health Preference Assessment. 
To apply, please send your CV and a cover letter to: Keith Aldridge. Assistant European Operations Manager kaldridge@rti.org 
RTI is an equal opportunity employer. Share this job
